kpi.name: M1006C265

kpi_info.title: ATTEMPTED INTRA-BTS LAYER CHANGES IN PCH/FACH TO DCH
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted intra-BTS inter-frequency PCH/FACH to Cell_DCH transitions with MBLB enabled. The counter is updated for the cell where the UE was located before the state transition attempt. UPDATED: When the UE is in URA_PCH/Cell_PCH/Cell_FACH state and the RNC sends RRC: Cell Update Confirm or RRC: Radio Bearer Reconfiguration to the UE, attempting to move the UE into Cell_DCH state under the same BTS but different frequency and MBLB functionality is enabled.

kpi.kpi_alias: ATTEMPTED INTRA-BTS LAYER CHANGES IN PCH/FACH TO DCH
